item.title: Hut 8, 埃里克-特朗普将成立比特币矿业公司
item.description: Hut 8 公司周一表示，它已与唐纳德-特朗普总统的儿子埃里克-特朗普联手创办了一家名为 American Bitcoin 的比特币矿业公司。【原文：Hut 8 said on Monday it had joined hands with President Donald Trump's son, Eric Trump, to launch a bitcoin mining company called American Bitcoin.】

item.title: Rocket Companies 将以 94 亿美元收购库珀先生集团
item.description: Rocket Companies 周一表示，它将以 94 亿美元的全股票交易价格收购库珀先生集团。【原文：Rocket Companies said on Monday it would buy Mr Cooper Group for $9.4 billion in an all-stock transaction.】

item.title: 有报道称美国食品及药物管理局最高疫苗监管者将离职，导致生物技术股暴跌
item.description: 据报道，美国食品和药物管理局（Food and Drug Administration）疫苗部门的一位高级官员已经辞职，这加剧了人们对突破性疗法审查速度放缓的担忧，美国生物技术公司的股价在周一盘前下跌了10%之多。【原文：Shares of U.S. biotech companies fell as much as 10% premarket on Monday following reports that a top vaccine official at the U.S. Food and Drug Administration had resigned, fanning worries over slower reviews for breakthrough treatments.】

item.title: 早间竞标华尔街无情
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 对冲基金在关税生效前逃离科技股，高盛集团称
item.description: 根据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）的数据，由于担心美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）4月2日的关税最后期限，世界市场下跌，对冲基金上周以六个月来最快的速度抛弃了科技股，并达到五年来的最高水平。【原文：Hedge funds last week ditched tech stocks at the fastest pace in six months and at the highest levels in five years, according to Goldman Sachs , as world markets tumbled on worries over U.S. President Donald Trump's April 2 tariff deadline.】

item.title: Equinor 新北极油田将在两年内收回 80 亿美元投资
item.description: 埃奎诺公司（Equinor）位于北极巴伦支海的约翰-卡斯特伯格油田在几经推迟后于本周一开始生产，预计将在不到两年的时间内偿还其860亿挪威克朗（81.4亿美元）的标价。【原文：Equinor's Johan Castberg oilfield in the Arctic Barents Sea began production on Monday after several delays, and is expected to repay its 86 billion Norwegian crown ($8.14 billion) price tag in less than two years, the company said.】

item.title: 百胜餐饮集团首席执行官吉布斯将于 2026 年退休
item.description: 肯德基母公司百胜餐饮集团周一表示，首席执行官大卫-吉布斯（David Gibbs）已通知董事会，他打算明年从公司退休。【原文：KFC parent Yum Brands said on Monday CEO David Gibbs has informed the board of his intention to retire from the company next year.】

item.title: 独家报道Arm 预计今年其在数据中心 CPU 市场的销售份额将飙升至 50
item.description: Arm Holdings 公司的一位高管表示，在人工智能蓬勃发展的推动下，预计到今年年底，该公司在全球数据中心中央处理器市场的份额将从 2024 年的约 15% 猛增至 50%。【原文：Arm Holdings expects its share of the global market for data center central processing units to surge to 50% by the end of the year, up from about 15% in 2024 with gains driven by the boom in artificial intelligence, a senior executive said.】

item.title: 需求前景疲软拖累石油，欧佩克+走钢丝
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查显示，由于美国加征关税以及印度和中国经济增长放缓对需求构成压力，同时欧佩克+继续推进增产计划，2025年油价将继续承压。【原文：Oil prices are set to remain under pressure in 2025 as U.S. tariffs and slowing economic growth in India and China weigh on demand, while OPEC+ pushes forward with plans to increase output, a Reuters poll showed.】

item.title: 克里姆林宫称美国公司对俄罗斯稀土项目表现出初步兴趣
item.description: 克里姆林宫周一表示，一些美国公司对在俄罗斯联合开展稀土金属项目表现出了兴趣，但警告说此类讨论仍处于早期阶段。【原文：The Kremlin said on Monday that some Americans companies had shown interest in joint rare earth metals projects in Russia, but cautioned that such discussions were still at an early stage.】

item.title: 雷诺与日产进一步松绑长期联盟关系
item.description: 汽车制造商雷诺和日产周一表示，他们已同意进一步修改其长期合作关系，允许将双方的交叉持股比例从之前的 15%降至 10%。【原文：Automakers Renault and Nissan said on Monday they had agreed to further amend their long-standing partnership to allow for a reduction in their cross-shareholdings to 10%, down from 15% previously.】

item.title: 沙特阿美石油公司 4 月液化石油气 OSP 保持稳定，Sonatrach 下调 2-7
item.description: 贸易商周一表示，石油生产商沙特阿美公司（Saudi Aramco）将其 4 月份液化石油气（LPG）的官方销售价格（OSPs）与 3 月份持平，而阿尔及利亚的 Sonatrach 公司则因地中海地区需求疲软而将其 OSPs 下调了 2-7%。【原文：Oil producer Saudi Aramco keeps its April official selling prices (OSPs) for liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) unchanged from March, while Algeria's Sonatrach cut its OSPs by 2-7% due to weaker demand in the Mediterranean, traders said on Monday.】

item.title: 雷诺将收购日产在印度生产厂的股份，获得全部所有权
item.description: 雷诺集团周一表示，将收购目前由日产汽车公司持有的雷诺日产汽车印度私人有限公司剩余的 51% 股份，从而完全拥有该生产厂。【原文：Renault Group said on Monday it would acquire the remaining 51% shareholding in Renault Nissan Automotive India Private Ltd, currently held by Nissan Motor Corp , taking complete ownership of the manufacturing plant.】

item.title: 关税加剧经济衰退担忧，期货价格下跌
item.description: 由于担心特朗普政府将于本周公布的全面关税计划将损害全球经济，投资者回避风险资产，美国股指期货周一下跌。【原文：U.S. stock index futures tumbled on Monday as investors avoided risky assets on fears that the Trump administration's sweeping tariff plans set to be unveiled this week will hurt the global economy.】

item.title: 投资者权衡关税风险，外汇期权交易量激增
item.description: 对冲基金和资产管理公司一直在买入外汇期权，因为他们希望为特朗普政府关税政策刺激下的市场走势做好投资组合准备，而且最近市场对货币波动性的预期也有所回落。【原文：Hedge funds and asset managers have been buying up options on foreign currencies as they look to prepare portfolios for market moves spurred by the Trump administration's tariff policies and after a recent pullback in market expectations for currency volatility.】

item.title: 随着 "购买加拿大货 "的增长，越来越多的美国公司表示零售商拒绝他们的产品
item.description: 购买加拿大产品 "运动正在给那些寄希望于在加拿大零售货架上销售其产品的美国消费公司的执行办公室带来新的担忧。【原文：The "Buy Canadian" movement is sending new ripples of concern through the executive offices of U.S.-based consumer companies that banked on selling their products on Canadian retail shelves.】

item.title: 巴西咖啡农转而采用成本高昂的灌溉方式来满足全球对咖啡的需求
item.description: 去年的干旱重创了巴西的咖啡种植者，导致咖啡树干枯，全球咖啡价格屡创新高。但罗德里戈-布朗达尼（Rodrigo Brondani）预计今年将获得大丰收。【原文：Drought hit coffee farmers in Brazil hard last year, drying up trees and driving global prices to record highs. But Rodrigo Brondani is expecting a bumper harvest.】

item.title: 特朗普汽车关税威胁新一轮供应价格冲击
item.description: 当世界从大流行病的停产中走出来时，供应链的震荡给拥有一辆汽车的成本留下了持久的印记。【原文：As the world emerged from pandemic shutdowns, a supply chain shock left a lasting imprint on the cost of owning a car.】

item.title: 特斯拉交付量可能下降，因为竞争和马斯克的反弹激增
item.description: 由于首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的政治立场遭到反弹，加剧了市场对这家电动汽车制造商老旧产品的需求疲软，特斯拉的投资者正为第一季度汽车交付量下降做好准备。【原文：Tesla investors are bracing for a drop in first-quarter vehicle deliveries as a backlash against CEO Elon Musk's politics exacerbates weakening demand for the electric vehicle maker's aging lineup.】

item.title: 华盛顿通知雷普索尔公司将吊销其在委内瑞拉的执照
item.description: 西班牙石油公司发言人周一表示，美国当局已通知西班牙石油公司雷普索尔，其从委内瑞拉出口石油的许可证将被吊销。【原文：U.S. authorities have notified Spanish oil company Repsol that its license to export oil from Venezuela is to be revoked, a company spokesperson said on Monday, while Spain's foreign minister promised to defend Repsol's interests.】

item.title: 空中客车公司高管表示，管理供应链中断的能力正在提高
item.description: 空中客车公司（Airbus）的一位高级管理人员周一表示，供应链中断导致飞机交付延迟的情况正在减少，而且空中客车公司在管理供应链方面的能力正在大大提高。【原文：Disruptions to the supply chain that are delaying aircraft deliveries are lessening and Airbus is getting much better at managing it, a senior company executive said on Monday.】

item.title: 中国信息通信研究院：2月中国外资品牌手机出货量同比增长9.2%-路透社
item.description: 路透社根据一家隶属于政府的研究公司周一公布的数据计算得出，包括苹果公司 iPhone 在内的外国品牌智能手机 2 月份在中国的出货量同比增长了 9.2%。【原文：Shipments of foreign-branded smartphones, including Apple Inc's iPhone, in China rose 9.2% in February year-on-year, according to Reuters calculations based on data released on Monday from a government-affiliated research firm.】

item.title: 特朗普家族是如何接管世界自由金融公司的？
item.description: 随着 World Liberty Financial 筹集到超过 5 亿美元的资金，唐纳德-特朗普总统的家族控制了这家加密企业，并在业内专家认为有利于内部人员的管理条款的帮助下，攫取了这些资金的大部分份额。【原文：As World Liberty Financial raised more than half a billion dollars, President Donald Trump’s family took control of the crypto venture and grabbed the lion’s share of those funds, aided by governance terms that industry experts say favor insiders.】

item.title: 德国初创公司的太空火箭从挪威起飞数秒后爆炸
item.description: 周日，一枚旨在启动从欧洲发射卫星的试验火箭从挪威太空港起飞40秒后坠地爆炸，德国初创公司伊萨尔宇航公司（Isar Aerospace）称这是一次初步试验。【原文：A test rocket aimed at kickstarting satellite launches from Europe fell to the ground and exploded 40 seconds after takeoff from a Norwegian space port on Sunday, in what German startup Isar Aerospace had described as an initial test.】

item.title: 首次成功后，中国脑芯片项目加速人体试验
item.description: 一家中国研究机构和科技公司周一表示，该公司的目标是在今年年底前为 13 人植入大脑芯片，此举可能使其在收集患者数据方面超越埃隆-马斯克的 Neuralink 公司。【原文：A tie-up between a Chinese research institute and tech company said on Monday that it aims to implant its brain chip into 13 people by the end of this year, in a move that could see it overtake Elon Musk's Neuralink in collecting patient data.】

item.title: 欧洲央行帕内塔：美国贸易政策要求欧洲央行谨慎降息
item.description: 欧洲央行管理委员会成员法比奥-帕内塔（Fabio Panetta）周一表示，主要由于美国宣布贸易政策而导致的高度不确定性意味着欧洲央行在降低利率时需要谨慎。【原文：High uncertainty, mainly due to U.S. trade policy announcements, means the European Central Bank needs to be cautious in reducing its interest rates, governing council member Fabio Panetta said on Monday.】

item.title: 英国维珍航空自大流行病以来首次恢复盈利
item.description: 理查德-布兰森（Richard Branson）拥有多数股权的英国维珍航空（Virgin Atlantic）表示，自去年大流行病以来，该公司首次恢复盈利。【原文：Virgin Atlantic, the British airline majority owned by Richard Branson, said it returned to profitability for the first time since the pandemic last year.】

item.title: 维珍航空发现美国需求放缓的信号
item.description: 英国维珍航空公司（Virgin Atlantic）表示，在经历了2025年的强劲开局后，它开始看到美国需求放缓的一些信号。【原文：British airline Virgin Atlantic said it was starting to see some signals that demand was slowing in the United States after a strong start to 2025.】

item.title: 法国反垄断监管机构就隐私工具对苹果处以 1.5 亿欧元罚款
item.description: 法国反垄断监管机构周一对苹果公司处以 1.5 亿欧元（1.6236 亿美元）的罚款，原因是苹果公司在 2021 年至 2023 年期间，通过一款名为 ATT 的隐私控制工具，在 iOS 和 iPadOS 设备上滥用其移动应用广告的主导地位。【原文：France's antitrust regulator on Monday fined Apple 150 million euros ($162.36 million) for abusing its dominant position in mobile app advertising on iOS and iPadOS devices between 2021 and 2023 via a privacy control tool called ATT.】

item.title: 中国华为 2024 年利润下降，营收五年来增长最快
item.description: 中国华为技术公司（HWT.UL）周一表示，2024 年的利润与上年同期相比下降了近四分之一，当时出售荣耀手机业务带来的收入促进了公司的盈利，而公司的收入则实现了五年来最快的增长。【原文：China's Huawei Technologies (HWT.UL) said on Monday its profit fell by almost a quarter in 2024 versus a year prior when income from the sale of its Honor handset unit provided an earnings boost, while its revenue grew at the fastest rate in five years.】
